turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What'd you have in mind for your next move?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: The fleet is finally breaking up. I'm hoping they'll follow standard Imperial procedure and dump their garbage before they go into light speed.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Not bad, hot shot, not bad.  Then what?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Then we have to find a safe port around here.  Got any ideas?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: That depends.  Where are we?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Here ... near the Anoat system.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Funny, I have the feeling I've been in this area before.  Let me check my logs.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You keep logs?  My, how organized.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Well, sometimes ... Ah-hah, I knew it!  Lando Calrissian.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Never heard of that system.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Lando's not a system, he's a man. A gambler, con-artist ... all- around scoundrel ...  ... your kind of guy.  The system is called Bespin.  It's a ways from here, but reachable.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: A mining colony.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: A Tibanna gas mine.  Lando won it in a sabacc match, or so he claims. Lando and I go way back.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Can you trust him?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: No.  But he has no love for the Empire, that much I know ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You do have your moments ... Not many, but you do have them.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Let Ôer go, Chewie.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I don't like this.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: It'll be all right.  Trust me.  And keep your eyes open.  You wait here.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What are you staring at?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Who's staring?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You look silly.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: You look great.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Has Threepio turned up yet?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Huh?  Oh.  Your droid's been gone too long just to be lost.  He may have gotten into some trouble. Chewie went to look for him.  Come over here.  I want to check this out.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I hope Luke made it to the fleet all right.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Luke!  I'm sure he's fine.  Probably sitting around wondering what we're doing right now.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: He found him in a junk pile ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Something's wrong here.  Your friend Lando is very charming, but I don't trust him.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Well, I do trust him.  Lando's an old friend.  Must have been an accident.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Chewie, do you think you can repair him?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Look, sweetheart, I'm not going to have you accusing my friend of ...

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I was worried about you.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I'm worried about all of us.  I can't figure out what they're up to.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Me either.  They had me howling on the scan grid, but they never asked me any questions.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: ... I love you.  I couldn't tell you before, but it's true.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: ... just remember that, Ôcause I'll be back ...

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Loud and clear, kid.  What's up?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I've finished my circle and I haven't picked up any life read- ings.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: There isn't enough life on this ice cube to fill a space cruiser. My sentry markers are placed. I'm heading back to the base.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I'll see you shortly. A meteorite just hit the ground near here and I want to check it out .. Won't be long.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hi kid, you look strong enough to wrestle a Gundark.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Thanks to you.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: That's two you owe me, junior.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Probe?  What probe?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: That makes a good story.  But I think you just can't bear to let me out of your sight.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: About what?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Now don't get the wrong idea, pal. She was just trying to express her true feelings for me.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I hope you make your peace with Jabba.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Don't worry.  You haven't seen the last of us.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Why you slimy, double-crossing no-good swindler ... am I glad to see you.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: No hard feelings?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Are you kidding?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I always said you were a gentleman.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I'll bet.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: That won't be easy, my friend ... What brings you here, anyway?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Repairs ...

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: What have you done to my ship?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: That ship saved my life a few times.  It's the fastest hunk of machinery in the galaxy.  What's wrong with her?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Hyperdrive.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I'll have my people get to work on it right away.  Hate the thought of the Millennium Falcon without her heart.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: How's your mining operation going?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Not as well as I'd like.  We're a small outpost and not very self- sufficient.  I've had supply problems of every kind and ...  What's so funny?

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Nothing.  I never would have guessed that underneath that wild schemer I knew was a respon- sible leader and businessman ... But you wear it well.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Sorry friend, I had no choice. They arrived right before you did.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: I'm sorry too.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Get out of here, Lando!

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Shut up a minute and listen.  I'm doing what I can to make this easier for you.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: This ought to be good.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Vader agreed to turn Leia and Chewie over to me.  They'll have to stay here, but at least they'll be safe.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: You don't know much about much if you think Vader won't want us dead before this is over.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: He doesn't want you at all.  He's after someone named Skywalker.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Luke?  I don't get it.

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: All this just to get the kid? What's so important about him?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Don't ask me, but he's on his way.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Don't shoot!  I've done what I can for you.  I'm sorry it's not better, but I've got my own problems.  I've already stuck my neck out further than I should ...

turns.speaker: HAN
turns.text: Yeah, you're a real hero.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: What about Leia and the Wookiee?

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: You will find them well enough. But they must never again leave this city.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: That was never mentioned.  Neither was this bounty hunter taking Han. I hope you haven't forgotten our bargain.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: I forget nothing, Calrissian. Perhaps you think you're being treated unfairly.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Good.  It would be most unfortunate if I had to leave a permanent garrison here.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: We only use this chamber for carbon freezing.  If you put him in there, it'll kill him.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: I think not.  But I don't wish my prize to be damaged.  We'll test it first.  Bring in Captain Solo.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I'll take what's mine now.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Take them, but I'm keeping a detachment of troops here to watch over them.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: That wasn't the bargain.  You said the Empire wouldn't interfere in--

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: I'm altering the bargain.  Pray I don't alter it any further.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Hello!  What have we here?  Welcome, I am Baron Lando Calrissian, Administrator of this facility ... and who might you be?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You may call me Leia.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Sorry, am I interrupting anything?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Not really.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I must say, your beauty is unpar- alleled.  Truly you belong here with us among the clouds.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Would you care to join me for a little refreshment?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: .... We are a free station and do not fall under the jurisdiction of the Empire.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You're part of the mining guild then?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Not actually .... Our operation is small enough not to be noticed, so you might say we're enterprisers. Most of our trade is, well ... unofficial.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: It's a lovely outpost.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Yes, we keep pollution down by having the power reactor far below the city.  It's connected by a transfer shaft.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What about Han?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I didn't know you had a price on your head.  Vader has given you to the bounty hunter.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Lord Vader has set a trap for him and ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: ... we're the bait.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I'm coming over to your side, that's what.  And I have a feeling I'm making a big mistake.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: And when do you betray us again?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Look, I stand to lose everything by this.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: We have no use for your kind.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: This is no time to be choosy, honey.  What do you say we debate this later?  There's still a chance I can get you out of here.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Chewie's right.  We must try to save Han.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: There's not much chance, but the bounty hunter's ship is on the East Landing Platform.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Very noble.  Not smart, but noble.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You've probably never done an honorable thing in your life.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Sure I did ... once.  It turned out lousy.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What chance have we got in here? What are we going to do when they cut ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You'd better know what you're doing, or this is going to get very messy.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Don't worry about a thing.  I'll get us going.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: We've got to find Luke.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: His fate is sealed.  You'll be lucky to get out yourself.  All systems are on alert.  everything's locked.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What'd you say?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I didn't say anything?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I knew that set-up was too good to last .... I'm going to miss it.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Luke!

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Luke needs help.  We must go back.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: No argument, just do it.  That's a command!

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Wait a minute.  We're not going back there.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: Someone's falling.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: It's Luke.  Get under him.  Slow down.  Easy Chewie.  Line up your tracking system.  Lando, open the hatch.

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: The deflector shields are gone.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Are the coordinates set?

turns.speaker: LANDO
turns.text: I'm sure my men fixed it.  We've got nothing to worry about.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: That sounds familiar.

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: Nothing more can be done tonight. The shield doors must be closed. I can't wait any longer.  I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I understand.

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: The speeders should be ready in the morning.  They'll make the search easier.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Is there any chance of them surviving out there?

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: Slim, but yes, there's a chance. They have a shelter.  It's not much, but ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Have they analyzed the one that was killed?

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: Not yet.  They're working on it now.

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: We've picked up something outside the base in zone one, moving East.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Two transports at a time is awfully risky.

turns.speaker: RIEEKAN
turns.text: We have no choice.  Send them up ... and start clearing everyone out.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You rest now.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: So much has happened during the period of your indisposition, sir.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I'll be back later.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: You don't have to do this to impress me.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: If I might remind you, sir, the probability of successfully navi- gating through an asteroid field is approximately 365,000 to one ... a graceful surrender might not be ...

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Closer?!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Closer?!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: A tremor!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Sir, it's very possible this asteroid is not stable.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What??

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Oh my, no!

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Sir, we've lost the rear deflector shield.  One more direct hit on the back quarter and we're done for.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Well, what now?

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Rather touchy, aren't they.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I thought you knew this person.

turns.speaker: THREEPIO
turns.text: Artoo, you did it!  I never doubted you for a second ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Let's go.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: The Bacta are growing well.  The scars should be gone in a day or so.  Does it still hurt?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I'm fine.  Really.  Leia ... when I was out there and it looked pretty bad ... well, it made me think about things.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Me too.  I was afraid.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Leia ... What would you think if I went away for a while?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: What did you say?!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Where are you going?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I have this ... feeling.  I'm not sure, really ...

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: That's just great.  Why doesn't everyone just take off?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: What are you talking about?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: First Han, now you.  When am I going to learn not to count on anyone but myself? ...

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Han's leaving?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Calm down, will ya?  Tell me about Han.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: He wants to pay off that criminal he's in hock to.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Jabba the Hutt?

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: I could get more loyalty if I went down the hall and recruited some of those snow creatures.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Snow creatures ... they're here?!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Leia!

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Luke, no!  It's a trap.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: Lando, is he alright? ... Lando? Are you there?  How's Luke?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: He'll survive.

turns.speaker: LEIA
turns.text: This hyperdrive had better work.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I've never seen it fail.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Ready are you?  What know you of ready?  I have trained Jedi for 800 years.  My own counsel I'll keep on who is to be trained.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Why not me?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: To become a Jedi takes the deepest commitment, the most serious mind.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I have followed my feelings.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: You are reckless!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I will not fail you.  I'm not afraid.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: You will be, my young one.  Heh. You will be.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: It would be in seven pieces, were you a Jedi.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I thought I was in good shape.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Yes, but by what standard, ask I?  Forget your old measures. Unlearn, heh, unlearn.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Master, moving rocks is one thing, but this is a little different.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No!  No different!  The differences are in your mind.  Throw them out! No longer of use are they to you.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Okay.  I'll give it a try.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No.  Try not.  Do, do.  Or do not. There is no try.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I can't. It's too big.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Size has no meaning.  It matters not.  Look at me.  Judge me by my size do you?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I don't believe it.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: That is why you fail.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Concentration.  Heh?  Concentration.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I thought those seekers were set for stun!

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: That they are.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: They're a lot stronger than I'm used to.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: That would matter not were The Force flowing through you.  Higher you'd jump!  Faster you'd move! Open yourself to The Force you must.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No, no.  This will not do.  Anger is what you feel.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: But I feel The Force flowing!

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Anger, fear, aggression!  The dark side of The Force are they.  Easily they flow ... quick to join you in a fight.  Beware, beware, beware of them.  A heavy price is paid for the power they bring.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Price?  What do you mean?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: The dark side beckons.  But if once start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny.  Consume you it will ... as it did Obi-wan's apprentice.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Lord Vader ... Is the dark side stronger?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No, no.  Easier, quicker, more seductive.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: But how am I to know the good side from the dark?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: You will know.  When you are at peace ... calm ... passive.  A Jedi uses The Force for knowledge and defense.  Never for attack.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: But tell me why ...

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: No!  Nothing more will I tell you now. Clear your mind of questions ... Quiet now be ... at peace ...

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Four this time!  The Force you feel.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Yes ... I also feel danger ... death.  Something's not right.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I feel cold.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: This tree is strong with the dark side of The Force.  A servant of evil it is.  Into it you must go.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: What's in there?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Only what you take with you.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Ben?  Ben?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Free your mind and return he will.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: My mind fills with so many images.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Control, control you must learn of what you see.  Not easy, not fast.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I see a city in the clouds.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Bespin.  I see it too ... Friends you have there, heh?  Concentrate and see them you will.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I see them! ... They're in pain ... they're suffering.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: It is the future you see.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Will they die?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Difficult to see.  Always in motion is the future ... Back away, little machine!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: They're my friends.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Foreknowledge is helpful, but painful sometimes and dangerous too.  You have far to go in your training.

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: Yes, yes.  To Obi-wan you listen young one.  The tree.  Remember your failure at the tree!  Heh?

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I've learned so much since then.  And I'll return to finish ... I promise that, master.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: And sacrifice Han and Leia?

turns.speaker: YODA
turns.text: If it must be.  Yes.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: The fear does not reach you.  You have learned more than I anticipated.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: You'll find I'm full of surprises.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: And I too.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Your future lies with us, Skywalker. Now you will embrace the dark side. Obi-wan knew this to be true.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: There is much Obi-wan did not tell you.  Come, The Emperor will complete your training.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: I'll die first.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: That won't be necessary.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: All too easy.  Perhaps you are not as strong as The Emperor thought.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Time will tell.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: The Force runs strong in the Skywalker line.  You will achieve great power ... Come, join with me!  Together we will be the most powerful ... even stronger than The Emperor.

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: No! .... Never ....

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: There is no escape.  You must join me or die.  Don't make me destroy you here ... The Emperor is strong with The Force.  But if you join me, together we could overthrow Him.  Do not resist. It is our destiny!

turns.speaker: LUKE
turns.text: Never.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: The Hoth System?

turns.speaker: PIETT
turns.text: Yes, Sir .... we have visuals ... the System is supposed to be devoid of human forms ...

turns.speaker: PIETT
turns.text: Yes, My Lord.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Make ready to land General Veers' assault troops on the surface. Then deploy the fleet so that nothing can get off that system. You're in command now, Admiral Piett.

turns.speaker: PIETT
turns.text: Seventeen ships destroyed, we don't know how many got away.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: Anything on the Millennium Falcon?

turns.speaker: PIETT
turns.text: It won't get through the blockade.

turns.speaker: VADER
turns.text: I want that ship.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Did you call the Zoo?

turns.speaker: AIDE
turns.text: Yes, sir.  We're in luck.  The sick bay's almost empty except for a mauled fox cub, a deer with pneumonia, and a depressed gorilla. The Apes will be hidden from the public.  They'll be quarantined. If they want medical attention, it's available on the spot.  And the experts can start giving them the once-over first thing in the morning. General Brody's very pleased.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Me, too.  Can't have a lot of monkeys making messes in the Guardhouse.  Have we fed them?  Like raw steak or something?

turns.speaker: AIDE
turns.text: The Zoo tells me that chimpanzees, like all apes, are vegetarian, sir.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Good God.

turns.speaker: AIDE
turns.text: They suggested oranges.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: Excuse me.  I didn't mean to disturb....  What am I saying?

turns.speaker: AIDE
turns.text: They're...pretending to dress.

turns.speaker: COLONEL
turns.text: What d'you mean, pretending? They are dressing.  Where'd they get those clothes?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: So am I.  And I mean you no harm.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: We know that.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Do you have a name?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: My name is Cornelius.  And this is Zira -- my wife.

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: My name is Lewis -- Lewis Dixon .

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: Nobody's going to believe it.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Believe what?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: That primitive apes can talk.

turns.speaker: MILO
turns.text: In some fashion -- and I lack the intellect to know precisely how -- we have traveled from Earth's future into Earth's past.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: But we saw Earth destroyed.

turns.speaker: MILO
turns.text: And Earth will be destroyed -- just as we saw it.  Only, since fleeing it, we have passed through a....backward disturbance in time -- did you notice the Date Meter clicking down after the shock wave hit our ship? -- and we have returned to Earth almost two thousand years before its destruction.  That is another reason for keeping silence.  Our human captors would not be edified to know that, one day, their world will crack like an egg and fry to a cinder, because of an Ape war of aggression.

turns.speaker: MILO
turns.text: Zira, are you mad?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Dr. Milo, please don't call my wife mad.

turns.speaker: MILO
turns.text: I did not call her mad.  I merely asked her if she was.  And I repeat the question.  Are you mad?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: To a lot of psychiatric small talk --

turns.speaker: MILO
turns.text: And we can watch ...

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: A display of primitive apparatus --

turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: What, Lewis?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: There was a sort of carpetbag in the ship.

turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: With food?

turns.speaker: LEWIS
turns.text: No -- clothes.  Stevie, they changed into them.

turns.speaker: STEVIE
turns.text: I don't believe it.
